item.title: Prometheus University: The First Problems
item.description: Prometheus.edu is where I’ve started running into trouble. I think this was partially my fault, although it was interesting to kick the tires on chatGPT and start to hear where things rattle about a bit.

item.title: Prometheus University: The Beginning
item.description: I’m not a web developer (although I have some experience in this area).

item.title: Introducing Prometheus University
item.description: Prometheus University is the first, fully AI generated university. I’ve been tweeting and thinking a lot about chatGPT lately.
